name: Mire Duel
description:
Grab a friend and get ready for a duel!

Inputting the correct sequence will cause your character to fire his blaster. Hitting the inputs accurately will cause your multiplier to go up which makes your blasts travel faster.

Colliding blasts will cancel each other out and the first player to run out of health loses.

  • Player 1 controls: Xbox 360 controller [XYBA] or keyboard [WASD]
  • Player 2 controls: Xbox 360 controller [XYBA] or keyboard [8546] (on numpad)
  • Game will detect controller(s) so there is no need to select input type
  • Make sure controller(s) are connected before starting up the game or they may not be properly detected

Update 7/26/2015 - AI has now been added to the game. Select 1 Player at the main menu and from there you will be able to select your difficulty. Make sure to delete the old installation before installing the new version.
